## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Incomplete Electricity Generation Setup near Position (-9.5, -0.5)
This setup is designed to generate electricity but is currently non-functional.

## ERROR TIPS

### Non-functional Power Setup Halting Progress
*   The agent is unable to proceed due to placement limitations, likely stemming from the incomplete or non-functional electricity generation setup. Ensure the power generation components (offshore pump, boiler, steam engine) are correctly placed, connected, and fueled (if necessary) to enable further actions.
